mapper.select: SELECT mar_id,mar_photo,writedate,mar_subject,mar_time,substr(mar_location,1,2) mar_location FROM (SELECT ROWNUM NUM, N.* FROM (SELECT * FROM MARKET ORDER BY WRITEDATE DESC) N )WHERE NUM BETWEEN 1 + (#{page}-1)*8 AND 8 + (#{page}-1)*8
mapper.update: update market set mar_parti = concat(mar_parti,#{1}) where mar_id = #{0}
mapper.select: SELECT length(arr) - length(replace(arr,',','')) count FROM (SELECT mar_parti arr from market where mar_id=#{0})
